website_summaries.verdict: Whether they want to dust, sweep, mop, or scrub, your child can enjoy 12 different cleaning activities with this compilation.
pros: Each toy is durable like a real cleaning tool and can actually be used to help parents with chores
Includes a mop, broom, duster, and dust pan
cons: The height of the broom and mop may be too large for some children
Know how tall your child is compared to the size of the included toys

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy in the House
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old loves his cleaning supplies! He plays with the broom and mop daily. So glad I got him his own set because he was always getting mine. It’s cute watching him clean! Blurry story photo of all my kids but they’re in bed, tired from being a ‘cleaning crew’.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great toys and tools for kids to learning cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The set is in good quality, really “real” and all the items are well designed. My daughter actually can use each item (and she did) for real cleaning without any problem. Size is perfect for a 2-year-old kid to play with (she is around 100cm height). Now everytime we ask her to clean up something, she uses her own cleaning tool to do it! I’m satisfied with this order and totally recommend it to anyone looking for a good and practical cleaning toy set for kids. Not only toys but also real tools to use daily! The package is great, not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Shavin

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: They seem to only make these for toddlers. Someone should make bigger sets for older kids. This was the biggest one I could find and it barely works for my smallish 5 yo granddaughter. Plus the broom keeps falling off of the handle. Other than that, she likes it. The dust pan is cute but she doesn't use it much. The mop is too short but she has used it on occasion but because she has to bend over so far, it's not her favorite. The bucket is really neat and the spray bottle just gets used in the pool but the duster is the best thing. It actually works really well and she enjoys cleaning together.
customer_reviews.author: mommyhead

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit with the 2-year-old whose birthday party we bought it for! Every time he comes to our house he raids the cleaning stuff, including the more expensive Melissa & Doug cleaning set our kids have. We bought him this set for his birthday, and upon opening his gifts he immediately wanted to play with all of these. He shared with his friends, and it was adorable to watch the kids cleaning up after the party. These toys are well-made and realistic so the kids feel like they have the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This set is junk. First of all, box came ripped up and it was obviously returned prior to my purchase. The broom had dirt on the bottom and it was missing a piece for the handle. Spray bottle, wet floor sign and mop were missing. The towels were dirty and rolled up. I’m really surprised that it got great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece for broom
customer_reviews.text: Packaged arrived looking as if it was opened. The shaft for the broom was missing from the box. Not worth it to repackage and return.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a pretty good product. Most of the parts are nice quality, but we had issues with a few parts. The plastic bit on the broom broke within a couple of days, and the metal handle doesn't really secure into the brush part of the broom. The wet floor sign is cardboard, so that part won't last. The duster also leaves little green strands all over when you first unwrap it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is my granson's favorite toy to play with had to force the broom out of his hands for bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Adnaloy Notlob

customer_reviews.title: CUTE & USEFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 13 mo old grandson! He hasn’t started walking yet but that hasn’t stopped him from dragging the broom around or getting it all in and out of the bucket. Real microfiber. The broom works, I actually used the duster just to be part of the fun... it works and telescopes great! I’m eyeballing the smaller sprayer, what a great size. The dustpan and hand broom will be easy to take over soon. Lol! He watched me as I’d mop, back and forth, so this was an easy pick. It really is the same quality as our adult size plastic cleaning tools. Well worth the cost and love that it’s made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: PFor

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 13month old since he always trying to help around the house/ he is learning to put the parts away/ the spray bottle reads magic however you can open it and fill with water inn you choose to/mop,and broom extend/duster extends/and the fabric is removable to throw in the wash after your child plays with it trust me you will want to clean it to prevent germs to them or around your home/also comes with life like sponge and hand towels all of this is washable/ and the bucket is easy to use/ would recommend for little boys or girls!! my son approves!!!
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Metal liner in broom breaks, leaving dangerous edges that can cut the child.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and son were in the kitchen when their 16 month old son brought his broom to show them. It was in 2 pieces, broken on the handle. Inside the plastic handle was a metal reinforcement with sharp, broken edges. Very frightening to think what could have happened if he wasn't so upset and quick to want them to fix it. We all had really liked it and he "helped" his mama when she cleaned. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for helpful toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty good set, with o my two exceptions, the duster and the warning signs. My two grandsons LOVE helping me when I sweep, dust and mop! Perfect size for them (one is just under four ft tall and the other one is just taller than three ft). It’s nice I can do chores without being impeded! And it teaches them team work and that chores are a part of life. The wet floor sign could be better, it’s made of thin cardboard, and the youngest boy (2 1/2 years old) bent and therefore broke the duster on the second day. But I would recommend this set for price and fun factor!
customer_reviews.author: Jenine Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Mamas little helper
customer_reviews.text: My daughter always wants to help me clean when she sees me cleaning so my husband found the cute set for her so she can really "help". Its just adorable and I think will be the perfect size for her to easily control (compared to trying to handle a full size broom or swiffer) Now she has her own cleaning tools so she can "help" while mama does the real cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: PawPatroller

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a GIANT!
customer_reviews.text: The broom and mop handles are WAY too small for any child older than maybe age 2. I got it for a 6 year old obsessive helper, who is not tall by any standards and the broom and mop are comically tiny. My only other critiques are: 1. the caution sign is only cardboard, and not silicone or some other waterproof material. 2. The mop doesn't really fit in the bucket and there's no way to wring it out. Everything else is really nice. I especially like the collapsible bucket!
customer_reviews.author: NicciJemz

customer_reviews.title: Bummer! Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: The spray bottle clearly shows a squirter on top but it arrived without one! Two little girls are going to be disappointed tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Mama

customer_reviews.title: Teach your kids to clean up after themselves
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I actually tested the duster to see if it would do what it was meant for and it worked! My daughter loves the fully functioning spray bottle to the point I had to take it away because everything in her path got soaked. I have not tried the mop.. the mop bucket gets a little deformed once retracted, but does not effect the use of being a child’s toy. These are just like the full sized products. The only disappointment was the wet floor sign. I would have thought it was plastic, but it is not. It is cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: More than decent for the price paid! Very sturdy and easily assembled!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely satified with this product! I have a very rough 2 yr old boy who is kind of tall and more like the size of a 3 yr old. He loves it! And so do I! Good quality broom, very durable set. Very good for promoting housekeeping skills and make it seem like a game! Fully functioning spray bottle. Full sized cleaning cloths, retractable mop. ONLY CON!: the duster sheds but I'm so pleased with everything else it's easy to overlook. Will be purchasing more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: patrice

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Functional Toy Cleaning Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cleaning set. All the toys are functional and mini versions of the standard household items. We have actually used the broom and brush to clean up many times. I bought this last year for my then two year old son. He still loves all the items and pretends to clean things all the time. Definitely better than the Melissa and Doug set. My only disappointment is that the duster broke because I tripped over it and bent it. This is a great set that will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: It's Never Too Soon!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old Granddaughter LOVES this little cleaning set! She has watched me clean for her father since she was born and the older she got the more she wanted "help" her Grammy. This set is the perfect size for her little hands and her height and she loves that the bucket folds flat. She doesn't really understand yet but when she sees her Grammy get out the mop and spray bottle she goes and gets her own spray bottle with water and mop and mops right along side me. It's the perfect way to introduce a child to cleaning and make it fun at the same time. I would definitely recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap yet satisfying
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun set and my 19 month old loves it. It’s not intended for rough play as It is made of plastic. We had to glue/tape a couple pieces to make them sturdier. However, I give it five stars because it serves the intended purpose I had... it make my kid happy. Also side note, be prepared for your kid to make intentional messes to clean up. We walked in to a whole floor full of goldfish crackers.
customer_reviews.author: Dlhowland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little "cleaners" in your life!
customer_reviews.text: My two little girls are now "cleaning" my house. They were so excited when this arrived! Everything pictured was in the box, neatly packaged. The quality, for the price, is excellent in my opinion. I'm very happy with this purchase. The only assembly was screwing the handles onto the mop and broom. The washcloths, mop head, and dusting wand are all microfiber, removable and washable. The bucket collapses for easy storage. The spray bottle works and is perfect for water they can use for cleaning. The dusting want has a telescopic handle, and the mop handle is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: calmer

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves this set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. He loves it! He’s constantly cleaning. The cleaning tools are realistic but kid size. They are not super cheap plastic toys. They look and feel like they will last. Best of all he hasn’t touched my broom since he got it. A 2 year old with a real broom is a hazard to all living things and flat screen TVs. We all feel much safer and we don’t have to stop him from cleaning to his hearts content.
customer_reviews.author: Figi

customer_reviews.title: My mini-me loves to use this product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was getting to the age where she was wanting to help me clean. This cleaning set works great, and when I could find my cleaning items I would use some of these. Very durable, and super satisfied with this product. ***The only dislike I had was that I had about this was that, I got the cleaning bottle head and straw, but the bottle was not in with the rest of the products. made me sad, but we went to the dollar store and bought her one to go along with the rest of her cleaning toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kait M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 21 month old who loves to help clean around the house, so we thought this the perfect Christmas gift for him. When he saw it all, he loved it! Since Christmas three items have broken. The duster broke at the hands of an older sibling. The handle for the broom split while the baby was playing and then the handle on the dust pan broke.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Shreve

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great except for the mop
customer_reviews.text: All of these products are great I love the mop bucket it closes and opens I live there fact you can throw the mop cover in the washer. The broom works great. However the mop handle doesn't stay to the height we adjusted it to. It goes back down causing my baby to have to bend down and use it ...or now throw it around like another toy. But besides the mop all is great.
customer_reviews.author: queen

customer_reviews.title: Real working cleaning supplies made toy size
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed of the quality and exactly what I was looking for, my 5 year old who happens to love cleaning is very happy with the set of real working brooms and dustpan, mops, dusting rod, spray can, microfiber clothes of 3 colors, and sponge - everything is mini size real cleaning supplies, the mop and dusting rod extends 20 cm and 45 am respectively, and extends to match the length of the broom with a 55 cm handle, so the set will work for kids 2 through 6 years old, if you buy it, expect shiny furnitures and floors throughout the house in no time! :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just a couple months of play.
customer_reviews.text: Fun set, but not durable. After just two months of ply the broom broke and the duster came off the handle. The pieces are not well made. Some of the pieces seem to be more durable but time will tell. It is played with fairly often but not roughly, definitely not rough enough to break the pieces so quickly. A little duct tape and the broom is still usable. I’d recommend spending a bit more for a more sturdy set.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Real cleaning supplies
customer_reviews.text: So much better than I thought it would be! Every piece is a workable real piece of cleaning equipment. My 2 year old LOVES to clean. His favorite is the spray bottle. I fill it with water and let him go crazy on the our glass door. The broom, the microfiber duster, the towels and sponge.. all great. Only problem is the wet floor sign is cardboard.. not the biggest deal and the bucket is collapsible, too easily that my son keeps freaking out about his "broken bucket" 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We Created a Cleaning Wiz!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our two year old grand daughter LOVES the cleaning set. After cooking in her play kitchen, she cleans us with her cleaning set. During the day she follows Mommy around and sweeps and dusts. Our only 'problem' is she likes to wear the bucket on her head. That said, customer satisfaction is high. As for product quality, the pieces are sturdy and work well. I would have liked something to hold everything, but I knew that wasn't included when I bought the set.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Casie

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: I love the set and the seller was excellent in resolving my issue. The broom in my set did not have a top piece on it and the duster broke after one time of extending it out. I messaged the seller and they sent replacement pieces the duster shower broke again. I found that extending it too forcefully (like a child would do) breaks the tiny metal pieces that hold each rod together. The only other issue is the mop does not stay extended when using it. My kids still love the set and play with it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Really nice play cleaning set!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set! All the products are good size for even a 6 year old. I bought this for my two-year-old my 6 year old likes it also. Reason only gets four stars is because the broom handle will not stay on the Broom so I might have to have my husband super glue it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Little kid Cleaning Toys
customer_reviews.text: This little cleaning set is Hands down AMAZING. My 2 yr old son loves, loves it. It couldn’t have been a more perfect gift for him. Now he leaves mommy’s alone. My hubby and I loved it so much we also bought another set for our Travel Trailer. It’s the most perfect size and very steady. Not cheaply made at all. My son will be 3 in less than a week and he still LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Everybody is happy with this little bundle!
customer_reviews.text: This was all in all a great buy for my daughter! She is 2.5 years and I cannot get my housework done without her little hands in the mix! So I decided for Easter I’ll buy her, her very own cleaning tools! They’re very nice, especially for the price. They’re not just some cheap plastic look-alike. They’re the real deal, but kid sized! I think her favorite one would have to be the spray bottle and sponge. Of course I only fill it with water but she LOVES to clean the refrigerator door with it. I have an extremely clean refrigerator door and an extremely happy toddler; WIN WIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My one year old son LOVES this play set. He was always stealing my broom and mop to drag around the house so I got him his own set!. My only complaint is some of the items are a little flimsy. The wet floor sign is just cardboard so if it gets wet it is useless, and the duster came apart easily but I fixed it up with some super glue to keep the handle and cloth in place. All in all it is a great little set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Fun real miniature cleaning set for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Our son kept trying to have his grandmother give him the broom when she was sweeping in the kitchen so we decided to buy this set to give him his own. He loved it straight out of the box and is always playing with the different parts inside the box. All the pieces are basically “real” but miniature sized for toddlers. We have had this for several months and he still enjoys helping his grandma sweep the floors lol.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! Perfect size and fully functional.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning kit is exactly what I needed! My daughter is 3 and always wants to help me. She really needed cleaning tools that were her own size because she ends up banging my broom and mop into everything. She is thrilled with this kit and has been cleaning everything since it arrived. My favorite feature is that all of the tools are fully functional, even the little spray bottle. The broom is tall enough that it should be usable for a few years (she’s 3’1” and it comes up to about shoulder height on her now). And the mop handle is adjustable. I’m glad I chose this kit, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha K.

customer_reviews.title: Cutest, actual FUNCTIONING set I've ever seen! Perfect RV/CAMPER set!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our camper as it would take up less space and still function on a part time basis. They definitely do the job PERFECTLY!! They fit perfectly, hanging them with 3m products behind the toilet in our camper bathroom. The "play" swiffer actually mops VERY well and the cloths are washable... the broom, dust cloths, whisk broom and even the collapsible bucket are perfect for the space conservative environment of an RV. YES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set my my 1 year old. She really only uses the broom right now, but for the price and product quality I felt it was most cost efficient to purchase everything at one. The tools are actually useful and are the perfect size for little ones. Edit, I have snagged the dustpan/brush and duster for use in my vehicle. I think this speaks for the realistic quality of the products.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was really cheaply made. Things fell apart and I had to end up glueing a lot of things together before my kids could play with it. Wasn’t satisfied at all
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small hands in training
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that someone thought enough to make training our youth easier. Things have been scaled down enough to fit their hands not to mention everything is just like the adults. Everything is washable and easy to clean. My granddaughter mimics the things I do. My grandson joined in so now I have to get him one of his own. Looking forward to more amazing products like this.
customer_reviews.author: I'm loving life

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Mini Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old granddaughter has a "thing" with cleaning. She likes to use the rag, sweeper and dust pan. Either she's OCD or she just enjoys mimicking mommy. This set is authentic as it is just a smaller version of the items an adult would buy for cleaning. She loves it and so do I! Whatever makes her happy:)
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old grandson loves to sweep & I had to keep ducking my head when he used an adult broom. I bought this cute little set & it’s perfect!! I also teach preschool and took the bucket, spray bottle, sponge & microfiber cleaner wand to school. The children love those accessories & run to play with the cleaning supplies first lol!! Would definitely purchase again!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your little ones enjoy "helping out" they'll love this
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this set! Six months later and she's still playing with it nearly every day. Two of my friends ended up buying this set because their little ones loved it so much. This set has bright colors that appeal to both boys and girls. It's durable and realistic so they won't lose interest and resume raiding the broom closet lol
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Paquette

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Useful, Safe & Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are all usable cleaning tools. Even the spray bottle works (it’s empty for safety) my toddler loves to clean and is actually good at it. She can easily sweep up her spoiled Cheerios with this set. Also, I noticed when my sister who is in a wheelchair was over, this set was easier for her to use than a full sized set. The bucket is collapsible for easy storage. I have even used the mini brush to sweep up a small mess because it was the closest thing and convenient. Also I did not see anything on this set that could be a safety hazard. Good for toddlers and children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect product for children
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect product for children, light weight and perfect size. I was happy to see the spray bottle actually worked, but I had to cut the tube to size. I was more disappointed I had to put the heads on the rods myself, but was frustrated figuring out how they went and they didn’t go on easy. I did this and had to find another box to give it as the gift already assembled. Also, the wet floor sign was cardboard which got crushed in a second by the child. Maybe a more durable sign would be best. It ended up in the trash. Overall, useable, but just packaging and assembly frustration with the useless wet floor sign.
customer_reviews.author: Stef-an-knee

customer_reviews.title: Fun for getting Littles involved in chores
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters aged 4 and 2 wanted to help me with cleaning but the tools were too big and discouraging. This has been a great way to teach skills with tools that are the right size. They LOVE helping. The tools are good quality also. Not like cheap toys although they are a great price. They particularly love the telescoping dusting wand. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: lizzyanniegoat

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loved this! We fill the spray bottle with water and he sprays the floor and cleans it up. The handle was a tad difficult to get onto the broom and we ended up breaking it and having to electrical tape it on. But all in all it’s a good product for being a kids toy. My son always grabs the swiffer when he sees me cleaning. Now he grabs his cleaning stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra S.

customer_reviews.title: ONLY ONE WAY TO FIND OUT!
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable! After the reviews,I figured,I can laminate the caution sign. Wasn’t t so flimsy! The broom “came in three pieces “ ok,I recall regular brooms screw in at the bottom in general (Two pieces). I’d super glue it! Well that wasn’t the case! Every piece was perfect! So big deal. I had to clip the spray bottle tube.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed on size! Super small items
customer_reviews.text: Again another "mini" item! 22 mini sized items 🤦‍♀️ when will I learn my lesson!
customer_reviews.author: SABRINA

customer_reviews.title: Fun, sturdy and enough pieces to share!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest granddaughters ages 2, 3 & 4, love this Play 22 Kids Cleaning Set! There are plenty of pieces to accommodate several kids. The favorite piece is the spray bottle that really works! All pieces are the perfect size for little hands. Sturdy yet flexible. I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: KTBeth

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love to play house and these looked perfect for their small hands. Unfortunately 2 of the pieces broke in two pieces the first leaving sharp metal edges. What is still intact are being used.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shirley

customer_reviews.title: It took a bit of time to arrive but the quality is great! Very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: We had a set that was made out of plastic and it broke in no time. I found this one and ordered it right away. It took a bit of time to arrive but the quality is great! Very sturdy and well made. Some of the items look as though you could legitimately clean your home with them. My little helper loves it and uses it daily. The caution sign is just a small piece of cardboard but it's still adorable. I'd give this set 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: 12 mo old LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My 12 mo old is obsessed with the broom and mop. He brings the broom to bed with him. He sweeps all day long. He could give or take the rest of it. Actually the bucket is fun. I like that it's soft and, if he fell on it, I wouldn't worry about him hurting himself. He likes to take things in and out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Person Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Toy Cleaning Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set for small children and better than I expected. Its pretend fun gets my little kiddos in on the fun of cleaning. My only observation is that I have to lean it up against somethin; such as a wall or other toy. It would be nice if it had a stand alone organizer or dustpan to house the unit, otherwise, it is a great playset.
customer_reviews.author: EnJoyce

customer_reviews.title: Very cute mothers helper set!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I get my broom back! This is a very cute set of almost real tools so that little ones feel the pride of helping (or at least are getting the idea!) My favorite is the little spray bottle and microfiber cloth...the smile of delight on getting her very own perfectly sized cleaning supplies and cleaning her table was she worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel L. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cleaning toys
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old who kept trying to sweep the house with my full sized broom. He loves the toys and being able to “clean” and I love that I don’t have to fear that he will knock something over. This kit comes with all sorts of fun toys for him to “clean” with.
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin7

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6yo. She wanted to help clean, but thing was to big for her. Not much to put together. Hasnt broken which is saying something. Almost everything was plastic, rubber, and metal. I was disappointed in the caution sign. Its cardboard. That was riined within a day.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This came in and I opened it to check it out before givinging it to my child for christmas and he is going to love it. Everything was as described and he can use them to actually help since he has got in the cleaning phase. I would definatly purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Kids Cleaning Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift to my 2 yo grandson. It appears to be nicely made. I really think he is going to enjoy using this while my daughter does some cleaning around the house. He is at the age where he wants to do everything his parents do. I will enjoy watching him play with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this item for any boy or a girl who enjoys being the big helper around the house all of the items are fully functional and save me a lot of frustration with my three-year-old who wants to help me clean. The item arrived very fast and my toddler is in love with all of the items.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Fortenberry

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: The rags, sign, and sponge were junk. The bucket is not the best quality either. However the rest of pieces are fine. I like that the sister extends. My little girl likes to play with the broom and swiffer thing mostly. Still a decent set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking products but our 1 year old broke off a piece of the dust pan after 2 days of use. I would expect the product to have more durability.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B. Lewkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Quality, variety
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. My toddler always wants to help clean. These pieces are appropriately sized and safer than full sized items. The items seem to be quality and have nice features like the collapsing bucket and telescoping dusters.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift for kids and works well for small ages. Great price as well
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this little play set was great for my two year old nephew. The only bad thing was that the spray bottle didn’t come with a spray top. He was trying to open it right away since he likes to help his mom clean house. It was an adorable set. Just wish it had a spray top for the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Great kid size cleaning set!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (3, 1) love this play set! They were always stealing my broom which was much too large for them so it’s awesome to have a complete set in their size. The only problem I have is that the wet floor sign is cardboard and was easily bent out of shape. I love that the bucket and a couple of the handles collapse so they doesn’t take up as much space in storage!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyrella

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love this set. I was a little worried bc it said three and up. The mop is great for little ones as it telescopes to their size. The bucket is great. It collapses. The broom cause concern bc of its height. But all in all a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: functional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. Everything is very functional and useful, and easy for my 2 year old to use. my only remark for improvement would be to make the color scheme a bit less tacky, all one color or something less childish would look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: kristin wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and let your kids do the cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: This will be my go-to gift for 3-5 year-olds. I bought this for my 4 year-old to clean her new playhouse. Within moments of opening the box, she was mopping my floors – for real! All of the pieces are working cleaning supplies sized for little hands. I might have to get a second set to keep inside the house! The spray bottle was originally missing the sprayer and the broom was missing the top part of the handle. I sent pictures to the seller and had replacement parts within a week. I am extremely happy with this purchase and the outstanding customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney VandeWiele

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces - returning
customer_reviews.text: We received the toy, unpacked the box and immediately gave it to the kids and realized that it was missing the main part to the broom.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping mop defective
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this and it really does clean. My floors have never been in better shape. The telescoping mop seems to be hit or miss on quality. Mine doesn’t extend so my 40” kiddo, it’s too short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old and she loves it. She is learning to help clean and this toy is teaching her that. She absolutely loves playing with the duster really amazes her. I like that it looks real and everything is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: shoptillidrop23

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: A must have. Such good quality! My son is 15 months and he always walks around with our broom. I got him this as his own and its perfect. The quality is amazing, the broom is a regular broom, the mop is like my swiffer lol and the microfiber cloths are just like my cleaning ones, also the bucket is retractable which makes it easy to use for other things like his toys when we go out or even the sand at the beach. 5 stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Eleni Anneta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Willing Helper
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this!! He was always struggling with the regular broom, dust pan, & such. I was so happy to find this set. I was originally only looking for a broom, whisk broom & dust pan but for $2 more they offered 9 more pieces!! A real bargin. UPDATE: Unfortunately the telescoping duster and the mop didn't last very long. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CCSookie

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic and sizes are great.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 21 month old great niece. She was excited and my house has been swept and dusted several times daily. She is a very hard working little one. All items were realistic, height adjustable and just the right size for her to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Mini version of adult cleaning supplies
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised by the quality of the cleaning tools. They are of quality that of the ones I actually use. My son likes to clean with me and so it's been nice having him clean the house with me. He has perfected holding the dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Camarena

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! The duster has a retractable extending handle and the spray bottle really works. So far appears to be sturdy and highly quality. The caution wet floor sign is made of cardboard and is way smaller than I thought but other than that I am very happy with my purchase and I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MAMABEAR

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool kit for kids. I was genuinely surprised at how inexpensive it is for what you get because the products are literally functional. Your kid can actually clean stuff with this! It even comes with several microfiber cloths that are good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But she really enjoys it and they look and perform like real cleaning tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 16 month old daughter. She LOVES it! Plays with it every day. Our friends were skeptical - cleaning products for kids??? But she really enjoys it and they look and perform like real cleaning tools. It's saved my broom from being attacked by her to play with now that she has her own little broom. Pleased on quality and number of tools. Like others said the wet floor sign is cardboard - no matter, we don't even play with it - too many other things to play with. She loves the spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great set...except for the wet floor sign.
customer_reviews.text: I love it and can't wait to give it to my grandson for Christmas. He loves playing with brooms and things and I know he'll love it. My only issue is the wet floor sign, it is a cheesy cardboard thing that he will destroy in seconds. I really think it would be best to make a plastic one or just simply remove the cardboard one and don't include one at all. It really cheapens the overall product the way it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! IFyour kid is into this kind of thing.....
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old got this on his birthday with a kitchen set. He didn't want to leave the house the ENTIRE DAY to do ANYTHING ELSE! Right now he's using his spray bottle to water his plant that's in a mason jar. ♡ ONLY BAD THING, the handheld duster, made of yarn/string SHEDS LIKE MAD!!!!!!! MOST OF WHAT WE CLEAN UP IS FROM THE DUSTER.
customer_reviews.author: TeamS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a little girl!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my granddaughter so I didn't see it. But my daughter said it is perfect for her active 3 year old. She said it is very much like adult cleaning supplies and appears that it will hold up well
customer_reviews.author: kathleen sala

customer_reviews.title: It lasted less than a week!!
customer_reviews.text: The duster, broom and mop broke in Less than a week!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Becraft

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 1 year old that loves to help clean with this play set. It seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Hershel Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Warning Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: We've had this item for a couple of weeks and he was able to pull this apart. As you can see there are very dangerous small pieces involved. I would not recommend allowing child to play with this piece. The broom is not very durable either. The straw on the end is already starting to fall off. Just over all cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old loves this set. The wet floor sign got wet right away and went into the trash but that's no biggie. We did not need to trim the sprayer. The bucket doesn't stay up very well but it's not an issue for us. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 20 month old shop brew would so messing with the real ones. He loves it. When I sweep, he gets his broom and sweeps to. The mop kinda loses the alpine all the time. But it's easy tipp put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hardy

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter's favorite Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 19 month old granddaughter who loves to help me clean. We often times found ourselves fighting over the broom and dust pan! Now she has her own cleaning supplies and we can now do housework together. Very sturdy and I've even find myself using the small broom and dust pan for my own cleaning needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bparshall

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buying
customer_reviews.text: First set I order cane broken. They replaced it but the second set didn’t even last thru my kid using it once.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom-4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning toys
customer_reviews.text: My toddler and 5 year old live this set. Now they have all their own interesting tools to help me clean up. The handle fell off the duster after about 6 months but super glue will do just fine. This product is really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda  S

customer_reviews.title: Better then Melissa & Doug!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves it! The adjustable mop handle is great and the broom was the perfect fit for him and he is big for his age. He really cleaned my house and mopped my floors LOL😂😂😂..... The price is great for such good quality! Way better then Melissa & Doug!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning set for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 2 year old Granddaughter who loves helping clean since she started walking. She would use a paper towel, wet wipe, etc to be cleaning. She loves having her own kid size cleaning set.. My disappointment was the mop handle swings vertical rather than horizontal. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Broom handle falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: Very cute cleaning set, however, the handle on the broom comes off so easily. We’ve had it 20 minutes, and it’s fallen off 2x. My toddler had it in his mouth trying to run. Accident waiting to happen. Also the caution sign is cheap cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: serah

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love This
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness. It’s the cutest set ever. !!! My 3 yr old granddaughter LOVES to clean with me. Her very best favorite thing to do is to use the squirt bottle filled with water on the sliding glass door and then wipe it off.
customer_reviews.author: Becky K.

customer_reviews.title: Buddy can ‘clean’ with mommy
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves to sweep along with mommy, and this set fit that need and many more! Doesn’t look like it’ll last a thousand years, but it really doesn’t need to. You get a lot for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: The Best Toy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I know the recommended age for this set is 3 yrs +, but I bought this set for my 1 year old. I got tired of him getting in the way of my cleaning and reaching for our germy broom and mop to play with. This set was the perfect toy for him. Its realistic enough to satisfy him, this allows Mama to do her cleaning lol.
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Compacted and durable
customer_reviews.text: My toddler likes it. Plays mostly with the small duster and pan. Comes pretty compacted so you could store easily. I can imagine you can use the bucket for taking to the beach or something
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Up

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised when I received this item. The box was very deceiving I was scared thinking it would be cheaply made...however it was not. It is very well made actually very close to the same you'd buy in the store for us adults. The "Wet Floor" sign is cardboard so I was disappointed in that because lets face it, it would have been ripped or bent in less than 24 hours LOL. But everything else was GREAT quality and I would purchase again. My 2 yo loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a gift for a friend. Her son loves playing with them daily and she says they are a great quality! He normally breaks things easily but these have held up for over a month!
customer_reviews.author: CountryGirl691324

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift for any little Toddler that wants to help momma clean! It has enough stuff to keep them busy while you do the real work. They really feel like they're helping!!
customer_reviews.author: cjlearned

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, real working cleaning supplies!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1-year-old son and he loves it! The spray bottle works, so we actually had to borrow it for a real cleaning solution (sorry, son!) and the quality of everything is great. 3 months after purchase it’s all still going strong except for the handle of the duster. The plastic pulls right off the end, but nothing a dab of super glue won’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Amador
